summary: Set in mid-70's, 12-year old Dvir Avni navigates between the equality values of his home-born Kibbutz and the relationship with his undermined mother, whom the Kibbutz members will to denounce.
cast: Tomer Steinhof|Ronit Yudkevitz|Shai Avivi|Pini Tavger|Gal Zaid|Henri Garcin|Danielle Kitsis|Idit Tzur|Yosef Carmon|Sharon Zuckerman|Rivka Neuman|Ami Weil|Hila Ofer|Omer Berger|Natan Sgan-Cohen
title: Adama Meshuga'at
